titles.title: Better Airplane Noise Standards Act
To require the Federal Aviation Administration to complete within 1 year the ongoing evaluation of alternative airplane noise metrics to the current Day Night Level (DNL) 65 standard.
Better Airplane Noise Standards Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary:
Better Airplane Noise Standards Act
This bill requires the Federal Aviation Administration to complete within one year the ongoing evaluation of alternative airplane noise metric to the current Day Night Level (DNL) 65 noise standard.
